title: Cargo Build Plugin Configuration
description: Defines options for Cargo build plugin execution.

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

release.description: Whether to run cargo build in release mode. Default is false.

workspace.description: Whether to build all packages in the workspace using --workspace flag. Default is false.
